mainText:
Mr. Jobs will be missed. My sincerest condolences to all he leaves behind.

The Apple II was the first Apple machine that I every used and learned on.
Now, I use the MacBook Pro some 20+ years later.

What a visionary, what a genius, what an amazing man, what a legacy,  and
what a fighter. The world weeps today.

I am not good with words but, thought I just had to say what a great loss
the universe experienced today.

Thank you Steve Jobs, Thank you.
author: Thom
